Of the waste generated in fiscal 2020, approximately 58 percent 
was recycled, up 3 percentage points from fiscal 2019. The fiscal 
2020 recycling rates at our divisions were as follows: Retail Pharmacy 
International 76 percent, Pharmaceutical Wholesale 75 percent and 
Retail Pharmacy USA 55 percent. 
During fiscal 2020, less than 1 percent of the total waste generated by 
WBA was considered hazardous, and of that, 41 percent was recycled, 
34 percent was incinerated and 25 percent went to appropriate 
landfills in accordance with federal, state and local regulations. DISCOVER
